channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: Six takeaways from Trump's big speech
item.description: The president declares "America is back" as he spars with Democrats and gives a shout-out to Elon Musk.

item.title: Nine things about Lesotho - the country 'nobody has ever heard of'
item.description: Lesotho is called the kingdom in the sky - it is the only country entirely above 1,000m.

item.title: China says it is ready for 'any type of war' with US

item.title: 8 tax deductions you didn't know you qualified for
